description: University of Colorado Colorado Springs graduate in Computer Science with a Master of Science. Fueled by a passion for cybersecurity, I strive to make a positive impact on digital safety of those around me through cybersecurity.
skills: Programming in C, C++, C#, Java, HTML, SQL, Elixir
Windows, Mac, and Linux (Ubuntu, Kali) OS
detailOrQuote: Albert Einstein once wisely said, “Out of clutter, find simplicity. From discord, find harmony. In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.” These profound words serve as a guiding light for my personal mission: a relentless commitment to improving efficiency, a fervent embrace of challenges as avenues for growth, and a steadfast dedication to infusing every action with efficiency and integrity.
